name: LEAVING GREENLAND on the WORLD’S LONGEST DASH 8 FLIGHT!
description:
▶︎ Support ME and become a PATRON to join my WhatsApp Group and many more perks!

This is the World's longest Dash 8-200 Flight from the Flight Deck.

Class: Economy
Route: Nuuk (GOH) to Reykjavik (KEF)
Plane: Dash 8-200
